Contact Us Our Projects ⟶

Sixty One Steps is data-driven digital agency equipped to competently handle all cloud managed services, design, development and digital marketing needs. We empower brands to adopt technology in the age of digital transformation by providing technology and business process consulting services for SME segments at a cost-effective and flexible pricing structure. We offer white label solutions for other digital agencies.

We value data, and it enables learning from errors of the past. This knowledge facilitates predicting patterns, decoding from the massive amounts of data generated from our regular transactions and avoiding blunders in future. Zoho is a source of inspirations not only in terms of the brand-building strategy but of organisational workflows and integration between applications. Today, we are not only powered by Zoho, but we are Zoho Authorised Partners.



About Us ⟶

our services

These services will be used to establish them in the virtual space. Along with the full range of cloud-based applications that Zoho has to offer, this will place us in the perfect position to help establish their business transactions and communications through Zoho as well.

01

Cloud Managed Systems

The world is diving fast into the digital age, and organisations are climbing into the cloud for all of their business needs. We specialise in generating ideas and providing the strength and technical backbone to support them. With our knowledge of marketing and technological world, we blend insight and creativity to help business and brand initiatives.

02

Design & Development

Once the customised and optimised strategy is in place, we start on execution. Traditional content marketing highlights the features of the product/service, but designs tell the real story. These visual stories could often be the difference between a visitor and a customer of your brand and converts the customer into a recurring customer.

→ Logo & Branding

03

Digital Marketing

Digital marketing strategies are designed to increase the brand’s presence on digital media. It involves establishing the brand while increasing the interactivity of the brand across social media as well. We employ technical and creative processes to hit your goals. With the strategies that we apply to your brand, we put you on the right path towards results.


→ Search Engine Optimisation


→ Social Media Marketing

Sixty One Steps is a small yet powerful digital agency equipped to competently handle all of your cloud services, design, development and digital marketing needs. We are a Zoho Authorised Partner.
